summary: The video discusses the rise of the anti-immigration party AfD in Germany and its potential impact on new citizenship rules. It explains that despite the party's gains in regional elections, the coalition government in the Bundestag and Bundesrat have the majority, preventing the AfD from blocking the new citizenship law. The speaker provides updates on the law's progress and assures viewers she will keep them informed.
keywords: AfD, Germany, citizenship, Bundestag, Bundesrat, dual nationality, election results, political parties, coalition government, political leaning
